# SilkQuote

> Templatize, generate, and share dynamic quotes customers can review and accept. Free, native Salesforce quoting.

SilkQuote is a native Salesforce application that speeds up negotiations, reduces approval times, and makes quoting easier. Admins build reusable templates with conditional fields and custom terms. Reps generate professional PDFs in one click. Prospects review, comment on, and accept quotes via a hosted link. All inside Salesforce, at zero cost.

**Key facts:**
- Free: unlimited users, quotes, and templates
- Works with Salesforce Professional Edition and above
- No-code template configurator for admins
- One-click PDF generation for sales reps
- Native Salesforce integration (Lightning Experience)
- Compatible with DocuSign, Adobe Sign, and other e-signature tools
- Invocable from Salesforce Flows for automation
